abstract: A lawsuit against Merck sought medical monitoring for former users of the painkiller Vioxx.
snippet: A lawsuit against Merck sought medical monitoring for former users of the painkiller Vioxx.
lead_paragraph: A lawsuit against Merck that seeks medical monitoring for former users of the painkiller Vioxx was revived yesterday by a New Jersey appeals court.

headline.main: New Jersey Court Revives a Merck Suit
headline.print_headline: New Jersey Court Revives a Merck Suit
